channel.title: Multidimensional network on Bodong Chen

item.title: Notes: Wang2016-lu-Modeling customer preferences using multidimensional network analysis in engineering design
item.description: References Citekey: @Wang2016-lu Wang, M., Chen, W., Huang, Y., Contractor, N. S., & Fu, Y. (2016). Modeling customer preferences using multidimensional network analysis in engineering design. Design Science, 2. https://doi.org/10.1017/dsj.2016.11 Notes Summarize: This paper presents a case of using multidimensional network analysis – powered by ERGM – to model customer preferences in China’s car market. Data were from user surveys. The authors patiently set the background, introduce the techniques, compared MNA with unidimensional network analysis, and considerately presented various analytical decisions associated with these approaches.
